coreAtributes.authorTag: On the underside of each lens set, a faint engraving reads "Official Enforcer Issue, MFD by DSG Threadworks."
coreAtributes.name: Enforcer's night vision goggles
coreAtributes.description: With its array of four sight enchantments, this set of panoramic night vision goggles offers twice the field of view compared to older systems. The included mount is very flexible and can be securely attached to compatible headgear.

replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(help)] [npc2.name] equip the goggles and [npc.verb(lower)] them over [npc2.her] [npc2.eyes].

replacementText.playerSelf: You equip the goggles and lower them over your [pc.eyes].
replacementText.playerNPC: You help [npc.name] equip the goggles before lowering them over [npc.her] [npc.eyes].
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You force [npc.name] to equip the goggles and slap them down over [npc.her] [npc.eyes].
replacementText.NPCSelf: [npc.Name] equips the goggles and lowers them over [npc.her] [npc.eyes].
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] helps you equip the goggles before lowering them over your [pc.eyes].
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] forces you to equip the goggles and slaps them down over your [pc.eyes].
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] helps [npc2.name]'s equip the goggles before lowering them over [npc2.her] [npc2.eyes].
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] forces [npc2.name] to equip the goggles before slapping them down over [npc2.her] [npc2.eyes].
